info.description: Backend API for NexFlux Virtual Lab - An interactive electronics learning platform
info.title: NexFlux Virtual Lab API

get.description: Get list of all achievements with user's unlock status and progress
Get list of achievements unlocked by the current user

post.description: Send password reset email to user

200.description: Reset email sent (always returns success for security)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password

get.description: Get profile of authenticated user
Returns list of OAuth providers that are configured and available
get.summary: Get list of supported OAuth providers

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token
Register a new user with email, password, and optional username
post.summary: Register a new user with email and password

post.description: Reset user password with valid token

get.description: Check if a password reset token is valid
Get the authorization URL for the specified OAuth provider
Process OAuth callback and authenticate/register user

post.description: Process OAuth callback via POST request (for mobile/desktop apps and Apple Sign In)

get.description: Get list of available challenges with optional filters

parameters.description: Challenge type (all, daily, weekly, special, regular)
parameters.name: type

get.description: Get the daily challenge for today with bonus XP multiplier
Get list of challenges the user has started or completed
Get detailed information about a specific challenge including instructions

put.description: Update user's progress on an active challenge

400.description: Invalid input or challenge not started

post.description: Start working on a challenge (creates progress record)

400.description: Challenge not available or already started

post.description: Submit challenge for completion and earn XP rewards

400.description: Challenge not started or already completed

get.description: Get list of electronic components with optional filters
Get list of all component categories (no auth required)
Get user's favorite/saved components

post.description: Submit a request to add a new component to the library

get.description: Get list of component requests submitted by the current user
Search components by name, part number, or description
Get detailed information about a specific electronic component

post.description: Add or remove component from user's favorites

get.description: Get list of documentation articles with filters
Get featured/highlighted articles
Get most viewed articles
Get full article content with related articles and table of contents

post.description: Increment view count when user opens an article

get.description: Get list of all documentation categories with article counts
Get category details with its articles
Search articles and videos
Get list of video tutorials with filters
Get video tutorial details by ID
Get leaderboard rankings (weekly, monthly, or all-time)
Get user's notifications with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by type (achievement, challenge, system, social)
parameters.name: type

put.description: Mark all user's unread notifications as read
Mark a specific notification as read

get.description: Get list of current user's projects with optional filters

post.description: Create a new project for the current user

get.description: Get list of public project templates that can be used as starting points
Get detailed information about a specific project including components and collaborators

delete.description: Delete a project and all its components (owner only)

get.description: Get list of collaborators for a specific project

post.description: Invite a user to collaborate on a project by email

delete.description: Remove a collaborator from a project

post.description: Create a copy of an existing project (including components)

put.description: Toggle the favorite status of a project

get.description: Get user's current streak information and history
Get the profile details of the authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile details of the authenticated user

post.description: Upload a new avatar image for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Avatar image (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, max 5MB)
parameters.name: avatar

400.description: Invalid file or file too large

delete.description: Remove the avatar image for the authenticated user

get.description: Get notification and other settings for user
Get comprehensive user gamification statistics including XP, level, streak, etc.
